messages: you can only run away so far and for so long. eventually you'll run out of time and places.
we skype and watch videos of pole dancing at the same time....
you can only run away so far and for so long. eventually you'll run out of time and places.
we skype and watch videos of pole dancing at the same time....
it's so exciting that my sister can say "see you in a couple days!!" now when she's on the phone with me :) 11 DAYS TIL DISNEY WORLD.
